features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Unified authentication system using Supabase for user login, session management, and role-based access control

features.name: Dashboard System
features.description: Role-based dashboards for different user types including employees, managers, admins, and super admins

features.name: Performance Tracking
features.description: KPI tracking and performance evaluation system for employees

features.name: Client Management
features.description: Client onboarding, tracking, and management system

features.name: Employee Management
features.description: Employee onboarding, directory, and management system

features.name: SEO Module
features.description: SEO team specific features including data entry, reporting, and appraisal

features.name: Reporting System
features.description: Various reporting dashboards and analytics features

features.name: Arcade System
features.description: Gamification system for employee engagement and rewards

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Shared UI components used throughout the application

features.name: API Services
features.description: API services for interacting with the Supabase backend
